sourcesContent:
import LP_ABI from '../abi/LendingPool.json'
import { web3, network } from './web3.js'
const {
  liquidatorAddress,
  addressToLiquidate,
  collateralAddress,
  repayTokenAddress,
  lpAddress,
  liquidationAmount,
  gasLimit,
  receiveATokens,
  dynamicGasPrice,
} = require('../config.json')[network]

const lpContract = new web3.eth.Contract(LP_ABI, lpAddress)

export default lpContract
